name: Dual Fate: Puzzle Rooms
description:
Dual Fate is a block pushing 2D puzzle game inspired by sokoban where you play as a "Guy" who has to rescue his "Buddy" who is stuck in multi-dimensional worlds, solving challenges in each levels presented as rooms with changing rules and interactions.

Ultimate goal for each level with whatever challenge it presents : Guy should meet his Buddy.


Credits :

Sokoban and Baba is you for inspirations in game mechanics.

Tileset :

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

Font :

https://www.1001fonts.com/users/tepidmonkey/

Music :

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/
